summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to wastewater property and service of Seattle Public Utilities; authorizing transfer to the Ronald Wastewater District of responsibility for wastewater services north of the City; declaring certain wastewater property north of the City surplus to the City's needs; authorizing sale of such surplus property to the Ronald Wastewater District and joint use of certain wastewater facilities after the sale; and authorizing execution of agreements and other documents necessary to accomplish the sale and joint use.
committee: Water Resources, Solid Waste and Public Health
